verses.text:
Rise, oh sleep-ing dust of A-dam! Rise, oh daugh-ters of the sod!
Come, ye heirs of life and glo-ry, Come, ye chil-dren of our God!
O what hush-ing still the storm; There is rest for all the hope-ful, There is rest for all the hope-ful.

O what joys a-wait the faith-ful! O what rest for wea-ry hands!
O what songs the ran-somed sing-ing! O what glo-ry in the land!
O what hush-ing still the storm; There is rest for all the hope-ful, There is rest for all the hope-ful.

chorus.text:
Hark! that shout! Hark! that shout!
Je-sus comes with joy and pow-er;
Hark! that shout! Hark! that shout!
Come, ye ran-somed, this the hour!
